document.full_text: japan appeared resigned on monday to a long fight to contain the world's most dangerous atomic crisis in 25 years after high radiation levels complicated work at its crippled nuclear plant.
document.title: disaster-hit japan faces protracted nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: japan appeared resigned on monday to a long fight to contain the world's most dangerous atomic crisis in 25 years after high radiation levels complicated work at its crippled nuclear plant.
